data.name: Socrates Jones: Pro Philosopher
data.detailed_description:
Everyone Socrates Jones knows seems to love philosophy— everyone except Socrates himself. A simple accountant from New York, Socrates has never been interested in philosophical questions or the art of arguing. But when he finds himself debating for his life against a queue of famous philosophers, Socrates Jones has no choice but to expand his horizons in a quest to find the true nature of morality.

The classic online game, rebuilt for Steam!
Face off in a series of interactive debates against famous philosophers— and a deer repellent salesman. Ask questions and present counterpoints to find problems in your opponent's ideas and cut through the NONSENSE!

A loving homage to a certain lawyerly game series, Pro Philosopher introduces its own mechanical twists to cross-examination gameplay, alongside a charming story and healthy helping of stupid jokes.

If you've never played Pro Philosopher before, now is as good a time as ever— It's free! And fans of the original release can look forward to:

Presentation Improvements!
  • Higher resolution character art and giant flying text!
  • New 16:9 layout!
  • Improved UI during debates. Improved UI in general!

Additional script polish!
  • 99% is the same, of course. That's the point of a remake.
  • A few weirdly worded lines are a little less weird, though!
  • Em dashes instead of double hyphens! Double hyphens were declared a categorical evil.
  • Perhaps a little something extra...

Numerous quality of life improvements!
  • Controller Support!
  • An actual conversation log!
  • The ability to save at any point!

data.short_description: Debate for your life against brilliant thinkers in a battle of wits. Poke holes in their arguments and cause them to freak out— or just tell them their faces are ugly. NONSENSE!
data.reviews:
“A critical (thinking) hit. It's funny, weird and thought-provoking, not to mention the best possible way of discovering the breadth of moral concepts across history.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“With great art and a light-hearted take on some big ideas, Pro Philosopher is a prime example of how edutainment can be effective and still be fun.”
9/10 – JayIsGames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
